product_name: Royal Robbins Solid Jasper Shirt - Men's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The casual Royal Robbins Solid Jasper Shirt blends organic cotton and recycled polyester for a first-rate fabric that is cool, comfortable and breathable. Seersucker organic cotton/recycled polyester fabric is designed to pucker and sit just off the skin for improved airflow in hot weather. Mesh inside the yoke also improves airflow and breathability to boost your comfort. Single chest pocket. Royal Robbins Solid Jasper Shirt has a traditional fit. Closeout.
short_description: The casual Royal Robbins Solid Jasper Shirt blends organic cotton and recycled polyester for a first-rate fabric that is cool, comfortable and breathable.
